Html:
Hello,

I am new to FO.NET. I got to a deadend when trying to remove styles from XSLT file and putting them in a CSS. There isn't much on Internet either except this forum.

Thanks.

Hello

FO.NET does not support CSS - so I don't really understand the question. There are some XSL:FO to HTML tools out there, so perhaps that is what you should look for?

FO.NET supports XSL:FO to PDF only.

Cheers
Mark
